Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures Game Books

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures Game Book 8: Trouble on Tatooine
Episode I Adventures Game Book 8: Trouble on Tatooine was the eighth installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures game books.
You are in big trouble. Slave hunters are on your trail. An innocent band of Ghostling children is depending on you. And you have just one chance for freedom.
